tagline: Official Korean Distributor of Himed, LLC Biomaterials
hero_subtitle:
Precision-engineered materials for orthopedic, dental, and spinal implants.
ISO 13485:2016 certified. Manufactured in the United States.
iso_certified_desc: Manufactured in Himed's state-of-the-art New York facility under strict good manufacturing process (GMP).
astm_compliant_desc: All materials meet ASTM F1185 standards for trace element limits. Complete compositional analysis provided.
precision_desc: Controlled particle sizes, crystallinity, and composition ratios. SEM imaging and XRD analysis for each batch.
applications_desc: Orthopedic implants, dental implants, spinal implants, bone grafts, tissue engineering, and laboratory research.
support_desc: Expert guidance on material selection, processing methods, and application-specific requirements.
custom_desc: Additional particle sizes and custom HA/b-TCP ratios available upon request. Tailored to your specifications.
ready_desc: Browse our complete product catalog or request a quote for your specific application. Our team is ready to assist you.
composition_desc: This biphasic calcium phosphate (BCP) is available in multiple HA/b-TCP ratios. Select the composition ratio to view available particle sizes.
product_selection_desc: Select the products you're interested in. You can add multiple products to your quote request.
project_placeholder: Please describe your project, requirements, and any specific technical needs...
project_help: Include details about quantity requirements, timeline, regulatory considerations, etc.
comments_placeholder: Any additional information you'd like to share...
request_samples: I would like to request product samples
request_certificates: I would like to request certificates of analysis
form_agreement: By submitting this form, you agree to be contacted by INH GLOBAL regarding your quote request.
error_loading: Error loading products. Please ensure the data files are accessible.
quote_subtitle: Fill out the form below and our team will respond with pricing and availability within 1-2 business days.
meta_title_home: INH GLOBAL | Premium Calcium Phosphate Biomaterials for Medical Devices
meta_desc_home: Official Korean distributor of Himed biomaterials. ISO 13485 certified calcium phosphate materials for orthopedic, dental, and spinal implants. Hydroxyapatite, TCP, and BCP powders manufactured in the USA.
meta_title_products: Products - INH GLOBAL | Calcium Phosphate Biomaterials Catalog
meta_desc_products: Browse our complete catalog of calcium phosphate biomaterials. Hydroxyapatite, tricalcium phosphate, biphasic calcium phosphate powders and discs for medical device applications.
meta_title_detail: Product Detail - INH GLOBAL | Himed Biomaterials
meta_desc_detail: Detailed specifications and technical information for our calcium phosphate biomaterials. ISO 13485 certified materials for medical device manufacturing.
meta_title_quote: Request Quote - INH GLOBAL | Calcium Phosphate Biomaterials
meta_desc_quote: Request a quote for premium calcium phosphate biomaterials. Fast response within 1-2 business days. Custom formulations and bulk quantities available.
og_title: INH GLOBAL | Premium Calcium Phosphate Biomaterials
og_desc: Official Korean distributor of Himed biomaterials. ISO 13485 certified materials for medical implants and tissue engineering.
